body.name: CORSAIR iCUE Link H150i RGB Liquid CPU Cooler - 360mm AIO - QX120 RGB Fans - Fits Intel® LGA 1700, AMD® AM5 - iCUE Link System Hub Included - White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 6 mins
features: All-in-One CPU Cooling, Now with iCUE LINK: Add high-performance, low-noise AIO cooling to help get the most out of your CPU, now with simplified hidden connections thanks to the patent-pending iCUE LINK ecosystem.

Effortless Connectivity and Intelligent Design: Take your build to the next level with the patent-pending iCUE LINK ecosystem, letting you connect all your components together using universal connectors, all plugged into a single port on the included iCUE LINK System Hub. Build faster, reduce cable clutter, and create a more intelligent, cohesive system setup.

Hidden Connections for a Flawless Look: A hidden connection design moves all connections to the end of the radiator, allowing for a distraction-free viewing experience of the brilliant 20 RGB LED pump.

Unbeatable Lighting with QX RGB Fans: CORSAIR QX120 RGB PWM fans with a patent-pending Magnetic Dome bearing deliver powerful, quiet airflow pre-installed along a 360mm radiator, lit by an astonishing 34 RGB LEDs per fan.

Quiet CPU Cooling with Zero RPM Mode Support: Dictate your exact fan speeds up to 2,400 RPM with PWM control, plus support for 0 RPM PWM signals that allow fans to stop entirely at low temperatures, eliminating fan noise completely.
body.description: The CORSAIR iCUE LINK H150i RGB Liquid CPU Cooler helps your processor reach its full potential, complete with stunning lighting and hidden wiring for a flawless look. Take advantage of the innovative iCUE LINK ecosystem for fewer cables and easier builds. QX RGB fans deliver speeds up to 2,400 RPM alongside 34 RGB LEDs per fan. With pre-applied premium XTM70 thermal paste, a split-flow copper cold plate, and a 360mm radiator, you can ensure maximum cooling performance. Perfect for Intel® LGA 1700 and AMD® AM5, the iCUE LINK H150i RGB is your link to next-level cooling.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 57 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Saludos, a pesar de no ser muy fanatico de RGB, los uso ocacionalmente, por lo general estatico a un solo color.En este caso queria tener todo de una sola marca en cuanto a case, que es el 5000D airflow, 64GB de RAM, Corsair RM1000x Shift Fully Modular ATX Power Supply , si me gustarioa poder combinar la GPU y el Board, en cualquiera de los dos caso, ya que uno es msi y el otro asus, no he tenidop suerte con eso.En fin ahora a lo que vinimos, este sistema es super facil de instalar, luce espectacular. Te permite hacer un ensamble mucho mas limpio, el uso del Software es genial, realmente le tenia miedo a eso.compre otro par de cables mas, pues creia que faltaria para poder unir entre los fans delantero, el trasero y los del AIO. asi que si pides ambas cosas por el momento no es necesario que los compre apárte, en caso de que si desees hacer otro tipo de distribución diferente alo que muesto en las imagenes, puedes hacerlo.Algo super espectacular es la "detencion de los fans a traves de las luces.Lo pedi usado como nuevo, gracias a Dios solo la caja estaba maltratada, pero el articulo es totalmente nuevo, eso si que me gustó.En cuanto a lo negativo entiendo que el precio es un poco elevado, pero al final tambien se comprende que la calidad de los materiales y la estetica que este nos brinda vale la pena.En lo personal me hubiese gustado que tibiera velco o algo asi para las mangueras, aunque no quedan mal, son cosas personales.un punto que no es que sea negativo totalmente es qque no puede unirse a otros componentes de la misma marca auqne pueden convivir, tube que apagar desde la bios el aura, para poder usar esto mejor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great CPU cooler!
reviews.reviewText: Great CPU cooler! Easy to install! The instructions were great. Came with thermal paste already on the block, which was easy. It’s the size of 3-120mm fans. Cools the CPU well (if you’re running high end stuff, you’ll need more fans in your case). The lights can be changed in the iCue software. The software isn’t as intuitive as it could be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Installed cpu cooler over processor and it lit up for two seconds and died. Never did work or turn back on. Was connected to correct header but almost costed me my cpu overheating. I sent it back . Went and bought Capellix from best buy and it worked correctly. This model had fans pre installed and supposedly better input connections, but it did cost me my time and labor to install and uninstall for slightly lesser model that worked better out of the box. Dissapointed, Corsair products is still my favorite brand even though this one was a lemon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Link Ecosystem is nice, BUT
reviews.reviewText: So I'll start out with the fact that yes, I am a Corsair fanboy. Most of my components are Corsair or offshoots thereofI LOVE the H150I and I LOVE the idea of the link ecosystem cutting down on cables while still maintaining performance and consistency throughout the system.That said, you better hope you have enough 8 pin PSU ports because there are absolutely 0 ADAPTERS for the Link command module. If you have a 3080 TI, which requires 3x8 pin (6+2) cables directly from your power supply and your CPU requires another 2x8pin connections, you are very swiftly limited to peripheral/SATA power ports. Due to the fact that the power cable is a FEMALE only connection, you can't plug it directly into the PSU either.The link Ecosystem DESPERATELY needs longer and or alternative methods of powering the system as builders will likely have a hard time with these issues in the future if changes aren't made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Crashes and has overheated my cpu several times. Avoid it.

Le H150i est une solution de refroidissement liquide performante et esthétique. Avec un système RGB personnalisable grâce au logiciel iCUE, il ajoute une touche visuelle attrayante à votre configuration. Ses performances de refroidissement efficaces en font un choix idéal pour les utilisateurs cherchant à maintenir des températures basses, étant doté d'un processeur i7-14700K réputé pour avoir de haute température, en jeu, les températures reste au alentour de 30/40° au repos et 60/70° tout dépend du jeu / logiciel.
Prodotto bello e funzionale, di ultima generazione ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic addition to my new rig, keeps my cpu temperatures low and maintains it in the process. RGB is great and the fans come pre attached to the radiator. Very simple installation and fans have individual temperature sensors. Highly recommend to anyone looking for one and price is worth it.

Unbrauchbar, da sich Corsair weigert dem Käufer die Möglichkeit zu bieten in Icue eine eigene Pumpenkurve zu erstellen. Es macht halt keinen Sinn, wenn die Pumpe im "Leise Modus" auf 2500rpm ballert im Idle und normalen Desktopbetrieb. Die Pumpe hört man im ganzen Zimmer.. selbst noch aus 7-8 Metern Entfernung.Hab wieder meine alte NZXT Z73 eingebaut die im Vergleich im Idle/Desktopbetrieb unhörbar ist, dank der Möglichkeit in der NZXT Software eine eigene Pumpenkurve zu erstellen.Für mich unvorstellbar das einige mit so einer Lautstärke leben können..

Habe die WaKü nun getestet.Positiv:- Einfache Installation da die Lüfter vormontiert sind!- Tolle Lüfter, sowohl optisch als auch von der Kühlleistung!- ICUE Link ermöglicht einfache Installation und spart jede menge Kabel im Gehäuse!Negativ:- Pumpe ist sehr laut! Immer ein surren selbst auf "Leise"! Das bin ich von Corsair nicht gewohnt!- Die Kabel für den Anschluss sind leider ein wenig sperrig- Die Schläuche sind zwar ummantelt aber sehr "uneben" verarbeitet da auch die Kabel mit ummantelt sind.Fazit:Gute Kühlleistung und Optisch wirklich super! Installation auch super gelungen!Aber für den Preis finde ich es nicht Gerechtfertigt.Die Pumpe stört mich am meisten da die echt laut Surrt selbst durch das Headset hörbar.Werde die WaKü vermutlich zurück schicken..
